## ğŸ“ Checklist

*   [ ] **I have read and understood the Contributing Guidelines:** [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/chirag127/QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md)
*   [ ] **My code adheres to the project's architectural standards (React Native, TypeScript, State Management with Zustand).**

*   [ ] **I have added or updated unit/integration tests for my changes.**
*   [ ] **I have run the tests locally (`npm test` or `yarn test`) and they all pass.**
*   [ ] **I have ensured the build process is successful (`npm run build` or `yarn build`).**
*   [ ] **My Pull Request targets the `main` branch.**
*   [ ] **My commit messages follow the Conventional Commits specification.**
*   [ ] **My code is well-documented (comments where necessary).**
*   [ ] **My changes do not introduce any security vulnerabilities (e.g., sensitive data exposure, insecure dependencies).**

## ğŸ§  AI Agent Directives (As per AGENTS.md)

This pull request has been reviewed against the following AI Agent Directives to ensure alignment with project standards:

*   **Tech Stack Alignment:** Verified adherence to React Native, Expo, TypeScript, Zustand, and relevant mobile development best practices for late 2025 standards.
*   **Architectural Patterns:** Ensuring compliance with FSD (Feature-Sliced Design) principles and SOLID/DRY for maintainability.
*   **Verification Commands:** Tests executed via `npm test` / `yarn test`. Build validated via `npm run build` / `yarn build`. Linting via `npm run lint` / `yarn lint` (using Biome/ESLint).
*   **Security:** Initial scan for dependency vulnerabilities and adherence to secure coding practices.

*For detailed directives, please refer to the [AGENTS.md](https://github.com/chirag127/QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App/blob/main/AGENTS.md) file.*
